name: Deserted (wchunl)
description:
Deserted is a survival card game in which 2-4 players (survivors) are stranded in a desert. In order to survive, players must gather food, water, and resources. Natural events will occur everyday which could be either good or bad. Bad events can be avoided by building shelter, weapons, etc. from the resources they gather. Survivors are recommended to collaborate and work together to survive, by delegating tasks, preparing for natural events, or trading with each other. The survivors win if they survive, and lose if they don’t.

LINK TO PlayingCards.io Version: https://playingcards.io/ramjzr
